nodes.title: Description
nodes.body: A ritual of name-burning for the dead.

nodes.title: Related Terms
nodes.body: byang bzhus, byang bu bzhu ba, byang bsregs.

nodes.title: Example Texts
nodes.body:
• Bla ma mchod pa dang ‘brel ba’i gson gshin sbyang sreg (This is also for the living)
  • Byang sreg skabs kyi gsol ‘debs
